About App
Type 1 : Seperate hard lumps - Severe Constipation


 Type 2 : Lumpy and sausage like - Mild Constipation


 Type 3 : Sausage shape with cracks - Normal


 Type 4 : Smooth like soft sausage/snake - Normal


 Type 5 : Soft blobs with clear-cut edges - Lacking Fibre


 Type 6 : Mushy consistency with ragged edges - Mild Diarrhea


 Type 7 : Liquid consistency with no solid pieces - Severe Diarrhea
The purpose of the Deposit Diary, is to allow users who suffer with IBS and IBD to document and track their daily motions and in case of flare ups. 
\The users can record their type of stool, how many motions they have had, the level of pain and average duration. 
\Within the edit section of the app users can write notes about their days and keep track of important notes, which they can show to their General Practitioner or specialist so their records can be updated. 
\Another feature implemented into this application is a map, which allows the user to look at public toilets within their vicinity when out.
Created by Jake Phelan
\4th Year student studying Creative Computing at Waterford Institute of Technology. 
\For any requires about the app you can contact me by email
\JakePhelan268@gmail.com
